exceptions.exn: In environment a, v : nat H : In v ((fix freeVarTerm (s : fol.Term {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |}) : list nat := match s with | @fol.var _ v => v :: nil | @apply _ f ts => freeVarTerms (LNTFunctionArity f) ts end with freeVarTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} n) {struct ss} : list nat := match ss with | @Tnil _ => nil | @Tcons _ m t ts => freeVarTerm t ++ freeVarTerms m ts end for freeVarTerm) ((fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end) a)) Unable to unify "In v ((fix freeVarTerm (s : fol.Term {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |}) : list nat := match s with | @fol.var _ v => v :: nil | @apply _ f ts => freeVarTerms (LNTFunctionArity f) ts end with freeVarTerms (n : nat) (ss : fol.Terms {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} n) {struct ss} : list nat := match ss with | @Tnil _ => nil | @Tcons _ m t ts => freeVarTerm t ++ freeVarTerms m ts end for freeVarTerm) ((fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end) a))" with "False".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall a v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarTerm LNT (natToTerm a))

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
freeVarTerm : forall L : Language, fol.Term L -> list nat
natToTerm = fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end : nat -> Term Arguments natToTerm _%nat_scope
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
subAll.freeVarSubAllTerms1 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAll.subAllTerms L n ts m)) -> exists a : nat, In a (freeVarTerms L n ts) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m a))
existE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf T (existH v f) -> SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T g
existSys : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNT v T -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNT g) -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T f) g -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNT) T (existH v f)) g
subAll.freeVarSubAllTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (a : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L a) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerms L a ts) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerms L a (subAll.subAllTerms L a ts m))
subProp.freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
subAll.freeVarSubAllTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAll.subAllTerm L t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
subProp.subTermNil : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> substituteTerm L t v s = t
subFormulaExist2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (ListExt.list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (fol.existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.existH L x f else fol.existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s))
subFormulaForall2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (ListExt.list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (fol.forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then fol.forallH L x f else fol.forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (fol.var L nv)) v s))
subProp.freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
subAll.freeVarSubAllTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarTerm L t) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (subAll.subAllTerm L t m))
subAll.freeVarSubAllFormula1 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula L (subAll.subAllFormula L f m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))
substituteFormulaForallNice : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (a : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a) -> nat * fol.Term L -> {y : fol.Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}), (forall (b : fol.Formula L) (q : lt_depth L b (fol.forallH L v a)) (r : nat * fol.Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * fol.Term L, substituteFormulaForall L v a z1 q = substituteFormulaForall L v a z2 q
subProp.freeVarSubTerm3 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> In x (ListExt.list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerm L t)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subProp.freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
subAll.freeVarMap1 : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In n l -> In v (subAll.freeVarMap L l m)
not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (x a : A) (l : list A), ~ In x (a :: l) < -> x <> a /\ ~ In x l
subProp.freeVarSubFormula2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s))
in_nil : forall (A : Type) (a : A), ~ In a nil
subAll.freeVarSubAllFormula2 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v n : nat), In n (freeVarFormula L f) -> In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) -> In v (freeVarFormula L (subAll.subAllFormula L f m))
freeVarClosedList1 : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (v : nat) (x : fol.Formula L), In v l -> ~ In v (freeVarFormula L (closeList L l x))
folReplace.reduceCloseList : forall (L : Language) (l : list nat) (f1 f2 : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall v : nat, In v l -> ~ In_freeVarSys L v T) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f1 f2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (closeList L l f1) (closeList L l f2))
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
subProp.freeVarSubFormula3 : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarFormula L (substituteFormula L f v s)) -> In x (ListExt.list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarFormula L f)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
subProp.freeVarSubTerms2 : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> In x (freeVarTerms L n (substituteTerms L n ts v s))

```coq
intros a v.
unfold natToTerm, freeVarTerm, LNT.
simpl.
intro H; exfalso.
apply H.
Qed.```

original: intros a v. unfold natToTerm, freeVarTerm, LNT. simpl. intro H; exfalso. apply H.
